name: Night of the nerds escaperoom
description:
This is a school project that we made with a group for the Night of the nerds team. 

The game is a online multiplayer escape room made for 4 players. You are a group of teenagers in the klokgebouw.  You will need to make it to the top of the roof to shut down the laser. To get there you will need to use your mind to defeat the obstacles in your way.
